push_button.description: Push the button to initiate the coffee brewing cycle.

press_button.description: Press the button to start the brewing process.

twist_knob.description: Twist the knob to choose the desired coffee strength.

turn_knob.description: Rotate the knob to set the brewing preference.

wipe_coffee_machine_body.description: Wipe the body of the coffee machine to keep it clean and shiny.

clean_coffee_machine_body.description: Clean the body of the coffee machine.

clean_entire_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine including the knob, button and body using a mild cleaning solution.

make_coffee.description: Make a cup of coffee by adjusting the coffee strength using the knob and initiating the brewing cycle by pressing the button.

clean_whole_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine including the knob, button and body.

prepare_coffee.description: Prepare coffee by turning the knob to set brewing preference and pressing the button to start the brewing process.
